txt_en: Don't you love New Year's Day? You get to start all over!
txt_cn: 你不喜欢过新年吗？你能一切从头开始！

txt_en: We all carry something with us.
txt_cn: 我们都在负重前行。

txt_en: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
txt_cn: 实现“不可能”唯一的方法，就是相信它是可能的。

txt_en: Tears will never help.
txt_cn: 眼泪永远没办法帮上忙。

txt_en: Trust is earned.
txt_cn: 信任是要靠行动争取的。

txt_en: It's nice to be wanted.
txt_cn: 被记得的感觉真好。

txt_en: I love you not for who you are, but for who I am with you.
txt_cn: 我爱你不是因为你是谁，而是我在你面前可以是谁。

txt_en: All l've ever done in my life was making my way here to you.
txt_cn: 我今生的所做的一切都是为了找到你。

txt_en: In case I don't see you… Good afternoon, good evening, and good night.
txt_cn: 假如我再也见不到你……祝你下午好，晚上好，晚安。

txt_en: Pursue excellence, and success will follow.
txt_cn: 追求卓越，成功随之而来。

txt_en: Nothing like a little truth to sober you up.
txt_cn: 唯有事实最能让人清醒。

txt_en: It doesn't matter who you are on the outside. The main thing is who you are on the inside.
txt_cn: 你的外表并不重要，重要的是你的内心。

txt_en: We have always defined ourselves by the ability to overcome the impossible.
txt_cn: 我们总坚信自己有能力去完成不可能的事。

txt_en: Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
txt_cn: 如果没有黑暗，我们永远看不到繁星。

txt_en: God makes people lonely in a variety of ways so that we can go to ourselves.
txt_cn: 上帝借由各种途径使人变得孤独，好让我们可以走向自己。

txt_en: There is always a way when things look like there is no way.
txt_cn: 有时候看似山穷水尽，但其实正在柳暗花明处。

txt_en: Progress is the result of a bunch of failures.
txt_cn: 进步是不断失败的成果。

txt_en: Two roads diverged in a wood and I took the one less traveled by.
txt_cn: 树林中有两条路，我选择了人迹罕至的那一条。

txt_en: Don't let anybody tell you they are better than you.
txt_cn: 不要让其他人说他们比你强。

txt_en: If I was going somewhere, I was running.
txt_cn: 如果我要去哪里，我就跑着去。

txt_en: You can't let someone else's opinion tear you down.
txt_cn: 你不能被别人的看法打倒。
